text: Stoke-upon-Trent is commonly called just "Stoke". Rather confusingly, it is just one of the six towns that make up the city of Stoke-on-Trent, in Staffordshire, England. The other towns that make up Stoke-on-Trent are Hanley, Burslem, Fenton, Longton and Tunstall. Category:Towns in Staffordshire
title: Stoke-upon-Trent
